summary: Adds a new spell to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a new spell to the game.

Essentialy this is an improved version of the equilibrium spell already in the game. I changed the visual effects a little, and made it drain 33.33 health for 66.66 magicka, making it a one to two ratio. This makes the spell (in my opinion) much more viable than equilibrium, while still retaining that sense of danger. I find it perfect to use with my vampire necromancer.

You can find the spell at the end of the Ilinalta\'s Deep, which can only be accessed if you have finished or are on the quest from Azura. I\'m sure you understand why I thought this was a fitting location, and if you don\'t, you\'ll see why.

Installation is simple, just plop it in your data folder, or use the mod manager.

This is compatible with absolutely everything. I made sure of that.
author: PeterTran

files.name: Blood is Power
files.changelogHtml: Added blood splatter effect while casting spell.
